info.description: API to create, update and manage various types of bulk payments. This API could be used for processing incoming payment files containing a batch of updates such as salary transfer etc.
info.title: Bulk Payments

parameters.name: externalUserId
parameters.description: The identifier of the external user

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: payload
parameters.description: body Payload

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

parameters.name: recordStatus
parameters.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

beneficiaryId.description: Indicates the Id of beneficiary when beneficiary details are stored

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

sortCode.description: The bank identifier code which identifies both the bank and the branch where the account is held.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

valueDate.description: Shows the date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes).

transactionTypeId.description: This is the type of transaction for which Beneficiary is created i.e. within bank account transfer or other bank transfer etc.

reference.description: The Account number, arrangement id or Portfolio No, subscribing to the alerts.

paymentId.description: Indicates the unique reference number of the payment

signatories.description: The authorised signatories for the payments can be specified here. More applicable in case of corporate payments where multiple signatories are required to sign a payment instruction
